bibl.title: Tra Ecdotica e Performance: Per un Corpus Papyrorum Vergilianarum. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the FIEC International Congress, Berlin, August 2009. - All the thirty-seven documents - school or scribes' exercises, bilingual texts, quotations in grammatical texts - forming a new Corpus Papyrorum Vergilianarum are briefly presented and discussed with regard both to their papyrological and their more strictly philological aspects that are linked to the tradition of the Vergilian manuscripts. What needs emphasis here is the performance dimension of these texts, as their 'signs' and 'accents' show.
bibl.seg: SCAPPATICCIO Maria Chiara, Tra Ecdotica e Performance: Per un Corpus Papyrorum Vergilianarum. Avec résumé en anglais.

Paper presented at the FIEC International Congress, Berlin, August 2009. - All the thirty-seven documents - school or scribes' exercises, bilingual texts, quotations in grammatical texts - forming a new Corpus Papyrorum Vergilianarum are briefly presented and discussed with regard both to their papyrological and their more strictly philological aspects that are linked to the tradition of the Vergilian manuscripts. What needs emphasis here is the performance dimension of these texts, as their 'signs' and 'accents' show.
